subject: Football
Halls of Fame
Super Bowl
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The year began with a historic Super Bowl. Tony Dungy of the Indianapolis Colts and his close friend Lovie Smith of the Chicago Bears were the first two black head coaches to face off in the N.F.L.’s championship game.
snippet: The year began with a historic Super Bowl. Tony Dungy of the Indianapolis Colts and his close friend Lovie Smith of the Chicago Bears were the first two black head coaches to face off in the N.F.L.’s championship game.
